caption.title: Sensitivity analysis (doubling destination population parameter): Peak dates, peak prevalence, area not infected and final size.
caption.p: Peak dates for the global mean prevalence curve, peak prevalence, mean area not infected and mean final size as a function of clustering, with 95% confidence bands, when the destination population parameter of the gravity law was doubled. The lines correspond to the baseline scenario, 90% travel restrictions, 99% travel restrictions and 100% travel restrictions. Top left: peak date. Top right: peak prevalence. Bottom left: area not infected. Bottom right: final size.
Click here for additional data file.
